product_name: adidas Terrex Fast X Mid GTX Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: The men's waterproof adidas Terrex Fast X Mid GTX Hiking Boots deliver lightweight, low-to-the-ground performance for fast moving technical hikes. Breathable textile uppers with synthetic overlays for added support; adidas Outdoor FORMOTION(R) footwear is designed for enhanced motion control and downhill comfort. With a waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX(R) lining, feet stay dry and protected through all conditions. TRAXION(TM) outsoles provide the best grip and agility during fast activities; Continental(TM) rubber offers extraordinary grip on slippery surfaces. ADIPRENE(R)+ in the forefoot maintains propulsion and efficiency. adidas Terrex Fast X Mid GTX Hiking Boots have OrthoLite(R) moisture-wicking footbeds.
short_description: The men's waterproof adidas Terrex Fast X Mid GTX Hiking Boots deliver lightweight, low-to-the-ground performance for fast moving technical hikes.
